title: 144H.16 COMPLIANCE WITH OTHER LAWS.
text:
A PPEC center must develop policies and procedures for reporting suspected child maltreatment that fulfill the requirements of chapter 260E. The policies and procedures must include the telephone numbers of the local county child protection agency for reporting suspected maltreatment. The policies and procedures specified in this subdivision must be provided to the parents or guardians of all children at the time of admission to the PPEC center and must be available upon request.
A PPEC center must comply with the crib safety requirements in section 142B.45, to the extent they are applicable.
